column1: #text=By the weekend , our cereal boxes were empty , our bread was stale , and we had no produce .
#text=Our family got in the car and we were off to the supermarket .
#text=After parking , we grabbed a shopping cart and began roaming up and down the aisles .
#text=Mom got the shopping list out of her purse .
#text=It was useful in navigating our shopping trip and ensuring we didn ' t forget necessary items .
#text=When mom shouted out " carrots , " we grabbed a bag of carrots and tossed them in the cart .

column2:

column1: #text=Mom had us select a variety of products , from milk to pasta sauce .
#text=As we put items in the cart , mom crossed them off the list .
#text=Finally , we had everything from the list in the cart and were ready to check out .
#text=We loaded each item on the counter for the checker to scan .
#text=After the checker scanned each item , our total appeared on the register .
#text=Mom got some money from her wallet and handed it to the checker .
#text=The checker gave mom the change , as someone else bagged up our groceries .
#text=Finally , we headed home , ready to prepare lunch with some of the ingredients we had just purchased .
